EmailTemplate.name: 19-Public Safety-Mobile BB for LTE-Email-Nurture MBB LTE-T003MI.Email 3 Cyber Se
EmailTemplate.subject: Protect public safety operations from cyber threats
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> White paper Cybersecurity for public safety communications A successful cyberattack on a mission-critical communications network can jepoardize public safety operations and put lives at risk.
Read our cybersecurity paper <[[http://tools.ext.nokia.com/onestore?asset=201836&did=d000000001bk&utm_campaign=mobile_bb_for_lte&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email3-cybersecurity&utm_term=mbb_for_ps]]> to learn how network evolution, process automation, data analytics and encryption can provide in-depth protection that keeps hackers and malware away. Learn more about our solutions for public safety https://networks.nokia.com/industries/public-sector/public-safety/4g-lte <[[https://networks.nokia.com/industries/public-sector/public-safety/4g-lte?did=d000000001bk&utm_campaign=mobile_bb_for_lte&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email3-cybersecurity&utm_term=mbb_for_ps]]> © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
